text: Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Kei'n nangnidiang inthiangnga kanati, khachu nangni'n inngamna ningneiya halli ning inngamsammak jei inchu, kei'n theichang kuungnga kitho angnga nangni innum kheella thomator ningte. Hiwa bit eleiya, nangni'n hiwa ching diang um, ‘Inphuk inlang natheinuo ah tuipui son juota-taro nati innum,’ khawakha inthosik eii. Matt 17:20; 1 Cor 13:2
